description:
• We believe that everyone has a right to defend themselves.
  • We will focus on a few powerful concepts and a couple of techniques of self defense that will arm you to be able to defend yourself and your loved ones if a situations demands for it.
  • No need to practice thousands of kicks and punches to be able to defend yourself. Knowledge of basic human anatomy combined with some powerful concepts will enable you to be self-sufficient in self-defense.
  • Direct, efficient, non-classical and non-structured self defense is our motto.
  • These concepts stem from Martial Arts styles such as Jeet Kune Do (Bruce Lee's Martial Arts Style), Taekwondo, Hapkido, Aikido, Judo, Jujitsu, Karate etc.
title: Practical Self-Defense With No (or little) Training!
